name: lemony
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
tasting or smelling of lemon: Add the lemon juice and pour the lemony butter over the trout. I was so close to her that I could smell her fresh lemony perfume.
of a pale yellow colour: There was a beautiful lemony light falling along the shoreline.
More examplesFewer examplesHe crushed the leaves under my nose; they gave off a sharp, lemony smell.Beaten egg whites were folded into a lemony batter and poured into a pie shell.High-altitude balloonists and astronauts say that the sun is snow-white, yet it looks lemony to us mortals on the ground.The bird has grey and black feathers with a yellow smudge on its sides and a lemony crown.
